description:
One of the biggest challenges of SEO is how to scale organic rankings without triggering Google's spam alert. This course teaches any search engine marketer with basic SEO knowledge to maximize their online presence by using large-scale rankings search engine optimization strategy. This is the exact blueprint responsible for ranking over one million plus 1st page rankings on Google since 1998 for thousands of client websites.

This course covers one of the most important concepts in SEO which is keyword clout. By implementing the concept to both on- and off-page optimization process, you can gain a competitive advantage via bigger search engine presence than the competition.

Unlike some courses which focus on talking about software the instructor uses to bloat the course time, this course was designed to teach you the concepts that are needed to accomplish what the course promises without wasting your valuable time.
title: Achieve Large-scale First Page Rankings on Google in 2016
